title: VLS Environmental Solutions opens waste-to-energy facility in Quartzsite - Arizona Big Media
summary: VLS Environmental Solutions has unveiled a waste-to-energy facility in Quartzsite, AZ, aiming to provide sustainable waste management solutions for various industries to address clients' sustainability goals by transforming operational waste into alternative energy sources.
green_innovation: TRUE. This initiative focuses on waste-to-energy processing, contributing to environmental sustainability goals by providing sustainable energy solutions and promoting zero-waste practices in waste management.
business_innovation: TRUE. The introduction of a waste-to-energy processing facility represents a significant improvement in business processes for VLS Environmental Solutions, offering a new service that differs from their previous offerings and addresses the market's demand for sustainable solutions.
green_product: FALSE. The article does not focus on a specific product but rather on a waste-to-energy processing service and solutions.
green_process: TRUE. The waste-to-energy process described in the article aims to minimize environmental impacts, reduce waste, conserve resources, and promote sustainability through the secure destruction of waste products.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 562212 - Solid Waste Landfill, 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 221119 - Other Electric Power Generation, 562910 - Remediation Services
greenwashing: FALSE. The article focuses on the genuine efforts of VLS Environmental Solutions to provide sustainable waste management solutions and does not exhibit characteristics of greenwashing.
